faq.title: Are crypto transactions reversible?
faq.description:
Most crypto transactions are irreversible. Once a transaction is initiated on the 
blockchain network, it cannot be canceled or reversed. Users should exercise 
caution when sending cryptocurrencies and ensure they double-check the 
recipient's address.

faq.title: What is a digital wallet?
faq.description:
A digital wallet, also known as a cryptocurrency wallet, is a software application that
allows users to store, send, and receive cryptocurrencies securely. It stores the 
user's private keys, which are essential for accessing and managing their crypto 
holdings.

faq.title: Is registration required?
faq.description: You don't need to register on our site to make exchanges.
